title: Representations of Yokonuma--Hecke algebras
abstract:
The Iwahori--Hecke and Yokonuma--Hecke algebras have played crucial roles in
algebraic combinatorics and the representation theory of finite groups. In this
work, we use classical results from representation theory to compute the
character values of the Yokonuma--Hecke algebra at $w_{0}$ and $w_{0}^{2}$,
where $w_{0}$ denotes the element of maximal length in the corresponding Weyl
group.
